about.title: About Sudoku Duo
about.message:
Version 1.0.0

Hi! I'm Clemens â€“ and Sudoku Duo is my first self-developed app.

I love brain teasers and wanted to create a Sudoku app that not only relaxes and challenges, but also connects: With the unique 2-player mode, Sudoku becomes a shared experience â€“ perfect for friends, couples or friendly competitions.

If you like the app, I would really appreciate your support. Your rating in the Play Store helps me to further develop Sudoku Duo and new projects.

Thank you for being part of it.
Happy Puzzling! ðŸ§©

share.message: Play Sudoku Duo with me! A great Sudoku app with a unique 2-player mode. Challenge me! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.playfusiongate.sudokuduo
